Key Match Events: Brayan Rocchio hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning.
Andrés Giménez’s bloop RBI single in the fifth built a 2-0 lead.
Tommy Pham failed to tag up at third on Salvador Perez’s line drive to left in the sixth.
Paul DeJong followed with a sacrifice fly in the sixth.
Brayan Rocchio hit his seventh home run of the season in the bottom of the sixth.
Rocchio added a bases-loaded walk in the eighth against James McArthur for a career-best four RBI.
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro missed his second game after the death of his mother Dorann Stagnitta.
Bobby Witt Jr. had his big league-best 57th multihit game of the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Josh Naylor left for a pinch runner after singling in the eighth inning because of lower back tightness.
